snippet: In the good providence of God, promotion camewithout his seeking it, and sooner than he couldhave anticipated, through the death of his neighbour and co-presbyter, Dr Cramond, minister ofYarrow, which took place February 14, 1791.1 Atthe funeral my father received hints from variousinfluential parishioners how much they would likehim to be their pastor; and a non-parishioner,Samuel Russell, sen., watchmaker, Selkirk, broachedthe matter very broadly in such terms as these :" Have you not thought of applying for the presentation ?" and then, with a natural eye to themain chance, added, "If you would take an eightday clock from me, I think I could speak a goodword for you and lend you a lift, through a nearfriend of mine, Colonel Russell of Ashiestiel, one ofthe heritors."
